rewrite1:

Moving on to the seventh paragraph, adjust the Outline Level to Level 2. Make sure the text is not bolded, switch the font to Arial, and increase the space following the paragraph to 1 centimeter.

For the portion you've selected, center the text and set the spacing after the paragraph to 1 centimeter. Change the font color to Purple and set a right indent of 16 points.
